title: Submarine cable cuts may disrupt internet services in Pakistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 06 (APP):Internet users in Pakistan may face service disruptions during peak hours following submarine cable cuts in Saudi waters near Jeddah.
According to a spokesperson for PTCL, the incident has affected partial bandwidth capacity on the SMW4 and IMEWE systems.
“Our international partners are working on a priority to resolve the issue, while our local teams are actively arranging alternative bandwidth to minimise the impact. We sincerely appreciate your patience and understanding during this time,” the spokesperson said.
